title: Criticism of Capitalism and Globalization - Collection 9
description:
Criticism of Capitalism and Globalization - Collection 9:

We have 35 titles here:

-  Bales - Disposable People; New Slavery in the Global Economy (2012)

-  Beck et al (Eds.) - Global America; the Cultural Consequences of Globalization (2003)

-  Canterbery - Wall Street Capitalism; the Theory of the Bondholding Class (2000)

-  Cazdyn & Szeman - After Globalization (2011)

-  Das - Financial Globalization; Growth, Integration, Innovation and Crisis (2010)

-  Dimitratos & Jones (Eds.) - Resources, Efficiency and Globalization (2010)

-  Dodds - Global Geopolitics; a Critical Introduction (2005)

-  Farrar & Mayes (Eds.) - Globalisation, and the Global Financial Crisis and the State (2013)

-  Foster - The Ecological Rift; Capitalism's War on the Earth (2010)

-  Frank & Cook - The Winner-Take-All Society; Why the Few at the Top Get So Much More Than the Rest of Us (1995)

-  Friedman - The Machinery of Freedom; Guide to a Radical Capitalism, 2e  (1989)

-  Gagnier - Individualism, Decadence and Globalization; On the Relationship of Part to Whole, 1859-1920 (2010)

-  Harvie et al (Eds.) - Shut Them Down! The G8, Gleneagles 2005 and the Movement to Movements (2005)

-  Heelas - Spiritualities of Life; New Age Romanticism and Consumptive Capitalism (2008)

-  Humphries - Childhood and Child Labour in the British Industrial Revolution (2010)

-  Huwart & Verdier - Economic Globalisation; Origins and Consequences (OECD, 2013)

-  Jaishankar & Ronel (Eds.) - Global Criminology; Crime and Victimization in a Globalized Era (2013)

-  Larrain - Theories of Development; Capitalism, Colonialism and Dependency (1989)

-  McChesney - Digital Disconnect; How Capitalism Is Turning the Internet Against Democracy (2013)

-  McGuigan - Cool Capitalism (2009)

-  McNally - Monsters of the Market; Zombies, Vampires and Global Capitalism (2011)

-  Michie (Ed.) - The Handbook of Globalisation (2003)

-  Nault & England (Eds.) - Globalization and Human Rights in the Developing World (2011)

-  Nealon - Post-Postmodernism; or, the Cultural Logic of Just-In-Time Capitalism (2012)

-  Pozuelo-Monfort - The Monfort Plan; the New Architecture of Capitalism (2010)

-  Ritzer & Atalay (Eds.) - Readings in Globalization; Key Concepts and Major Debates (2010)

-  Rudra - Globalization and the Race to the Bottom in Developing Countries (2008)

-  Seabrook - Children of Other Worlds; Exploitation in the Global Market (2001)

-  Sennett - The Culture of the New Capitalism (2006)

-  Shelton (Ed.) - Capitalism in Business, Politics and Society (2011)

-  Sniegocki - Catholic Social Teaching and Economic Globalization; the Quest for Alternatives (2009)

-  Stanford - Economics for Everyone; a Short Guide to the Economics of Capitalism (2008)

-  Suter - Global Order and Global Disorder; Globalization and the Nation-State (2003)

-  Thrift - Knowing Capitalism (2005)

-  Wallerstein - The Capitalist World-Economy (1979)
